segments.text: I notice the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s sure she’ll get one soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s risking it just for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, and it’s spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl will probably get blamed too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so chaotic, but the kids seem to be enjoying it.
segments.speaker: PAR
